resources.string: Learn While Playing, dedicated to virtual teaching!

The INA trains, trains and certifies natural and legal persons, to contribute to personal growth, social mobility, productivity and competitiveness; that allows the country to adapt to the changes that the environment demands

The Ministry of Public Education (MEP) of Costa Rica is the government ministry in charge of administering the country\'s public education system. Its main functions are to execute plans, programs and other determinations that guarantee basic, public and free general education, coordinate the relations of the Executive Branch
Credits to those who participated in the creation of this project. Participants: Kenneth Piedra Vargas, William Cubero Navarro, Eduard Andrés Arias Quiros and Sebastián Alberto Mata Ortega
